Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Magalan100
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from Galateia Residence and are already wanting to return. The appartments are beautifully furnished and are immaculate. They are also spacious and comfortable. The location is perfect for visiting all of Istanbul with excellent dining and shopping within walking distance. Staff are wonderful and nothing is too much trouble and you are always greeted with a smile. We will be back to visit Istanbul and will certainly be staying at the Galateia Residence.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Americangurl
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent hotel and the apartments are very well decorated and maintained. We rented two apartments (one two bedroom and another one bedroom) for our family stay. The woman who works at the front desk every morning is lovely and was so incredibly helpful. I wish I could remember her name. She helped us book the whirling dervish show and the bosphorus cruise. The kitchens were well stocked with supplies and the fridge even doubled as a mini bar. We had some maid service every day but sometimes the towels were not changed and even though the sheets are supposed to be changed every other day, it did not appear that way. (This is why I am giving the hotel 4 stars.) The fellow at the front desk in the evening was also helpful with our luggage too. They do allow smoking in some of the rooms so that smell to our dismay did linger in the hallways. If you are arriving by taxi, please note that your driver may find it difficult to find the hotel. All of our taxi drivers could never find it so we were usually dropped off near Istikal Cadesi and then walked to our place. If you are arriving for the first time, I recommend using their car service, even though it is pricey just so you aren't dropped off far away and have to pull your luggage to the hotel. But the hotel provides these nice map cards that we always carried to help explain to our taxi drivers where we lived.

Reviews.Title: “So wonderful, we are already planning on returning to Galateia Residence!!”
Reviews.Author: NancyCNewYorkCity
Reviews.Content: We (myself, husband and our 2 children ages 10 and 15 years old) just returned to New York City after staying 8 nights at Istanbul's wonderful Galateia Residence. We rented the 2 bedroom, 2 bath, 4th floor flat which had a great view of the Bosphorus from the master bedroom and ensuite bathroom. The flat was very roomy, clean and comfortable, and had a well equipped kitchen allowing us to eat breakfast in daily, (and prepare lunch or dinner had we wanted to.) After a marathon day of sightseeing, we were all so happy to return to our "home" at Galateia Residence every evening. The location of the flat was perfect for our needs. We took the tram most days to the sights in the Old City, but if one were super-motivated, you could walk down the hill and across the Galata bridge to many of the major sights (approx 60 minute walk to Hagia Sofia?). The hip, trendy Beyoglu neighborhood where the flat is located had so many fantastic restaurants (found through a terrific food guide titled: Istanbul Eats by Ansel Mullins and Yigal Schleifer which I highly suggest foodies pick up!!) that we ate out every meal with the exception of breakfast. What made the stay at Galateia extra special was the wonderful staff which included: Serhat, Cagri, Emel and Nurhan who were all incredibly accommodating and did everything that they could to make our stay more comfortable. They made restaurant reservations, booked taxis, helped us with public transport and gave us great leads to the lesser-known sights and sounds of Istanbul, and helped communicate special requests to housekeeping. They were all top-notch! Though we just returned this morning from Istanbul, we are already planning our visit back to this dynamic, complex city and to our "home" at Galateia Residence!!

Reviews.Title: “best ratio quality/price”
Reviews.Author: sisulin
Reviews.Content: friendlly and helpfull staff, fluent in english, and ready to quicklly fix any trouble or fullfill a request. Just that was worth the expense, but you get on top a huge apartment, spotless clean, modern and most comfortable. You can go to a hotel in the old town and squeeze yourself in a 12 square meters old room, or you can go to Galateia and get 90 square meters of heated floors and a 2x2 meters latex bed, just next to a whole mile of car free shops and restaurants in neoclasical buildings; the choice is yours.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, modern and well equipped.”
Reviews.Author: F R
Reviews.Content: Galateia is wonderfull located, close to Galata Tower and to metro and tram stations. Although Istikal street is just up the street the place is quiet. There are a lot of shops and restaurants in the neighbourhood but only small places to buy food so cooking a real meal is not easy. WI-FI internet works everywere and the bathroom is not only modern and spacious but very confortable.

Reviews.Title: “Very spacious and modern. Good location for new Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Chiccathy
Reviews.Content: In a very quiet street but Tunel tram station is only a minute of walk away. No taxi driver can find the whereabouts of the street but u can ask for Tunel station and just walk a bit if u hv no luggage. But your main visit will be mainly Old istanbul. This hotel is less convenient. The room (apartment) is very spacious and very clean. Some rooms are in renovation too so they are now newly refurbished. The kitchen comes with everything u need for cooking and dining. The service is almost wonderful except they left behind a top did not belong to us in our laundry and gave us a shopping bag did not belong to us when we left. That was a bit worrying. Otherwise, their service is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Home of Excellence”
Reviews.Author: Faris F
Reviews.Content: i have been to many flat residences in Dubai,London,Amterdam,and Istanbul but i didnt feel at home only at GALAEIA Residence in regards of privacy,location,very clean ,the welcoming from all staff especialy Mr,SERHAT Erdemli and all the reception staff and most important the New wonderfull manager Miss Nurhan,

Reviews.Title: “Epic Location!”
Reviews.Author: no_stops
Reviews.Content: Although there were some initial bumps with our reservations, the staff at the Galateia Residence went above and beyond to make sure we felt welcomed and all issues were resolved. As with the pictures posted up of the place, they do not do it justice. The space is modern, comfortable, and new (the shower is great!). It's also, in my opinion, in the best location possible. The metro station is literally right up the street and you're super close to the tram that takes you to Sultanahmet and the older areas (which I wouldn't stay in for the fact that it's way too crowded there and hard to get in and out if you need to take a taxi). Istiklal, one of the liveliest places in Istanbul, with shops, restaurants, and amazing night life also feels right outside the building as it's so close, but as Galateia is slightly off of Istiklal, you still get the quiet and access to taxis (no cars on Istiklal). All that aside, the staff at Galateia are some of the nicest people we met in Istanbul. Always happy to help with directions, advice on where to shop and eat, and just great people. We really enjoyed our stay and if I ever make the trip out to Istanbul again, I'll be sure to stay here!

Reviews.Title: “centre of istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Emrah D
Reviews.Content: its one of the best hotel for to observe the multiculture of Istanbul.and also I liked the decoration of hotel and stuff was really helpfull with their smileface..Im planing to stay there again..

Reviews.Title: “Ammmmmaaaaaaazing!”
Reviews.Author: Yury F
Reviews.Content: If you want to stay in best place in Istanbul you MUST choose this apartment!!!! Everything that you will need - view, location, helpful stuff, and more and more!

Reviews.Title: “Great apartments in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: yke124
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean, well furnished, quite, spacious with a good location (a few meters from the metro station and istiklal road) & value was great. I look forward to staying there next time I visit Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and fantastic staff”
Reviews.Author: Silke1212
Reviews.Content: We stayed eight nights at the Galateia Residence and had a wonderful time. The location is fantastic â€“ in walking distance to Istiklal shopping street, TÃ¼nel square (with many nice restaurants, coffee places and small design shops) and the Galata Tower. Furthermore ÅžiÅŸhane metro station and TÃ¼nel funicular are just a stoneâ€™s throw away. Our apartment was located on the first floor. It was very clean, modern and spacious, had nice furniture and was well equipped. Cleaning service took place daily. There is a small fitness room in the building containing a treadmill, a bicycle and a rowing machine. We also had the chance to see the top floor apartment, which has a great city and Bosporus view but is of course more expensive than the apartment we rented. Particularly worth mentioning is the always friendly and helpful staff of the Galateia Residence who did everything to make our stay enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: MansourAldhlaan
Reviews.Content: We booked a 2-bed deluxe apartment, the apartment is very spacious, clean and modern.Â  If you like cocking your own meal, this your place. The staff were very helpful with anything we need and provide more than we expected in many situations. For example, we asked for direction for water park the gentleman provide us with directions and printed vouchers for discounted tickets.Â  The place is very safe and Istqlal is just moments from your door but you don't feel the noise when you at your apart.Â  The metro station is very close.Â  The only disadvantage: it is difficult to find it for the first timers, so let the guys arrange your pickup from the airport.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing views of the Bosphorus and very helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: STANZZA
Reviews.Content: Our apartment was on the 5th floor, with a living room, king bedroom, one and a half baths, a kitchen and a pull out twin bed tucked in a chair. The view took our breath away, and it was very nice to have a living room. We wouldn't recommend cooking, as the supermarket is a serious hike away. The location is great, near where Tunel comes into Istiklal Caddessi. It is down a steep hill from there, so not great for anyone disabled. Our taxi couldn't find it, so we called the hotel from Tunel, and the staff came up and got our bags, and took them down for us. The 4th floor may have equally nice views, but I think the view is blocked on the 3rd floor. The staff were always very helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect accomodation if you look for the best location and the best views”
Reviews.Author: estorde
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a peaceful, modern and cool apartment with the best views of the city, you must to book it. My wife and I booked it for our honeymoon and it was one of the best choose we did... apart of the fact of visiting this amazing city. The staff was always worried about us and they gave us nice tips. Located in the city center, not the historical one but the real one. Walking distance to the most highlighted places you can visit, and one minute to the metro station.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely worth the money!All rooms are somewhat spectacular or at least surprisingly cozy!”
Reviews.Author: alphacoaching
Reviews.Content: We particularly liked the discreet and prompt approach. Especially when the taxi driver did not know how to get us there (pedestrian area) the manager Mr Kukul met us personally where we were dropped. He and his staff went to all length to make our trip to Istanbul a smooth and relaxing experience! We had plenty of requests and wishes as this trip was a semi business affair! Efficient, friendly and flexible! Our expectations were exceeded! We usually stay at five star hotels for impeccable service! This residence is a seamless and most pleasurable treat for all occasions that take you to this wonderful city where staff recommendations are crucial! Thank you Mr Kukul and your very helpful and cheerful staff!

Reviews.Title: “A Perfect Apartment in A Great City”
Reviews.Author: dmerritts
Reviews.Content: Everyone traveling to Istanbul should stay at this property. It's in a great location with perfect accommodations and an amazing front-desk staff: Serhat + Serhat. They helped make our stay in Istanbul quite memorable. Can't wait to go back to Istanbul again and hang out with the Serhats. Only suggestion: The manager should step up and help out during busy times. He seemed absent when he could have helped out.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Residence with Two Serhats.”
Reviews.Author: Glu_Glu81
Reviews.Content: Impressed by the location. It is in the very center of every place to be and it is really in silence. If you compare with hotels in Sultanahmet, with this residence you can feel Istanbul inside. Also the concierge service is working like a charm. They advised really great night clubs and so many great tours which we recommend other guests... I would like to say thanks these two guys in the same name of Serhats :) SÄ± vous passez a Istanbul venez ici sans aucune hesitation !

Reviews.Title: “A home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: nayjam
Reviews.Content: Our family had a wonderful time in Istanbul and this was due in no small part to the wonderful apartment we stayed in at Galeteia Residence. We were in a two bedroom/two floor apartment which was clean and nicely furnished with a small kitchen but all the rooms were huge. The views over the Bosphorous were fantastic. The staff at the residence were brilliant and could not do enough for us. My kids (aged 8,14,16) all thought it was one of the best places we have ever stayed in which says a lot considering there was no free breakfast or pool. A great city and a great place to stay. Looking forward to going back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and accomodation”
Reviews.Author: paul_gannon
Reviews.Content: Located close to Galata Tower and the main shopping street-Ishtakal Caddesi. GR is down a side street - about 50 yards- so it was quiet but handy for shopping and eating out.

Reviews.Title: “that was the best residence ever!”
Reviews.Author: lainamos
Reviews.Content: I stayed there.everything was great.l really like the accomodation and my colleague also. the staffs are very helpful.whatever we request was done as soon as possible.we stayed in the deluxe apartment and the housekeeping was also great at their work.the design of the flat is so modern and unique. and also we were so happy about the reception staff.they were really excellent and so helpful. we had the best istanbul experiment while we were staying at galateia residence.I recomended to everyone if they are looking for the comfort and deluxe service.

Reviews.Title: “You should stay here”
Reviews.Author: farfar
Reviews.Content: One of the most pleasant surprise on our frequent holidays, even i read very good reviews and saw nice photos of the place. First of all, its a place where every detail is carefully decided and i like the place where you see the management put a lot of effort to maintain the standard, so you feel good paying value-for-money place. Location could not be better, in a small, quite street and still very central. Stuff very helpful. You have all apartment for yourself, very modern, clean, comfy bed, very elegant building. Definitely, we will come back again!

Reviews.Title: “Great location with the services of a hotel and the privacy of self catering”
Reviews.Author: Pilar_Dublin
Reviews.Content: We were 5 friends meeting in Istanbul for a few days of relax, culture and fun. The first great surprise we got when we arrived in Galateia Residence is that they offered us an upgrade from the Deluxe Apartment to the Superior Bosphorus Apartment with such an amazing view... We were delighted! The pictures on their website show pretty much the apartment as it is... Modern, bright, clean, comfortable and spacious... The bathrooms were too and the shower was amazing! The situation of the apartments is very convenient. One minute walk to Istiklal Caddesi and Galata Tower, in the vicinity of trendy shops, bars and restaurants and around the corner to more traditional streets too. A very nice walk to Sultanahmet in the mornings/sunset crossing the Golden Horne along Galata Brigde. Alternatively you can get the tram as 2 stops of the main line convenient to GR. The staff are very friendly and helpful, always smiling and willing to make your stay easy.

Reviews.Title: “Exotic Romance In Turkey”
Reviews.Author: Eurocat75005
Reviews.Content: Looking for a romantic getaway in Istanbul? Look no further. This place is the answer to your dreams. I've been living and working abroad and my husband and i had one week together. We chose the Galateia Residence. Our every need was met. The apartment was huge, the bed soft and luxurious and the bathtub long, deep and delightful. It is near public transport, shopping and clubs yet it is tucked away for a quiet, private stay. I dream of going back!

Reviews.Title: “do you want to feel like a princess?”
Reviews.Author: umurrr
Reviews.Content: if you want to feel like you are at home, but you dont want to think about anything, this is the right adress. full of worm smiles, peace, comfort... thanks for everything, especillay a great hotel manager Yuksel...

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place”
Reviews.Author: AndreyMesh
Reviews.Content: We stay in: - Superior Apartment - very convenient , - Bosphorus Duplex Apartment - Spacious, - Superior Bosphorus Apartment - beautiful view. Each has its charms.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, clean apartment, helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Anonworldtraveller
Reviews.Content: Apartment very quiet and in good location - near Galeta area which is very trendy. Staff were very helpful especially as I had my wallet stolen in Istanbul - receptionist arranged for wallet to be delivered at hotel after it being found by someone in another location.

Reviews.Title: “Galateia home from home”
Reviews.Author: Drhlime
Reviews.Content: We chanced upon these serviced apartments while looking for a long term residence & loved it so much we stayed nearly 3 months.Perfectly located & appointed for self catering when your jaded from regular hotels. This is better than a 5 star hotel & has much more in room comfort .The front of house staff & management are outstanding & helpful in every way. The housekeeping also some of the best we've experienced anywhere in the world & we've been travelling & living in hotels for over 12 months.will be returning soon

Reviews.Title: “ok but not value for money”
Reviews.Author: ak1London
Reviews.Content: my husband and i stayed at galateia residence with some friends and their children. the aparments are not big enough to accommodate adults and children. the sofa bed is very small and you have to pay an extra $50 per night for an extra bed. the staff are ok but unless you can speak turkish you'l have a difficult time communicating with them. the location is great as its walking distance from the shopping parade and the trainline. we ordered breakfast but were very dissappointed as they gave one slice of cheese and butter and some bread and it cost $10!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, Attentive and Personalized Service”
Reviews.Author: LionelsMom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently did a multi city trip throughout Europe for our anniversary and chose Istanbul as our destination for 5 days. We were a bit surprised to see how expensive hotels in Istanbul were and stumbled upon this apartment style hotel in Turkey Travel Planner. What a great find! To be as accurate as possible, I will say we did start off a bit rocky because the service we used from Backpackers International transportation could not find this place. The hotel can be hard for some taxis/drivers to find so you MUST indicate to them to take you to the top of Tunel at Istikal and drive down by the Swedish embassy. If you choose Galateia, I recommend getting very detailed directions from them to have ready for your cabdriver before you arrive. The location is SO central and in the fun, always jumping Beyoglu district. We are a couple in our early 30's and this was such a vibrant neighborhood at night --all the action happens on the side streets! However, the hotel is nicely located on a quiet street. We stayed in a Junior Deluxe apartment that is on the website and all I can say is that it looked even better in person. It was such a "pretty apartment" and had wonderful amenities--spotless kitchen, nice flat screen tv, a dining room area. I can only think of a couple of drawbacks: you could hear some of the noise from the apartment upstairs (some footsteps but minimal)/ And a minor one--is I wish there had been a tv in the bedroom. What sets this place apart though is the spectacular , 5 star service you get from the hotel manager Yuksel and one of the front desk managers, Barbaros. Fantastic, cordial, accommodating and quick to respond to your requests. Yuksel--thank you for the wonderful treat to help us celebrate. The cakes were divine! We highly recommend this hotel--it gives you the sense of home in a peaceful street with the proximity to everyday life in Turkey. We would return without a doubt.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best hotels we've ever enjoyed”
Reviews.Author: jimhopkins
Reviews.Content: We travel a lot: Our trip to Istanbul this summer was part of a four-month tour of the U.S. and Europe. So, when I write this is one of the best hotels we've ever enjoyed, I'm saying a lot. More than a hotel, Galateia Residence is a small apartment building run as a hotel. We stayed in two of Galateia's apartments during the two weeks we spent there during our visit to Istanbul. Both units were finished beautifully, with modern, fully stocked kitchens. The beds were exceptionally comfortable. They were quiet. The location was terrific: just steps from Istanbul's major entertainment boulevard -- -- Istiklal Avenue -- as well as a subway stop, and a funicular that takes you to other transportation links to major mosques and other tourist sites. Views from our top-floor apartment were wonderful. And best of all: the nightly price was no more than a conventional hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A spotless haven in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: Ventolina
Reviews.Content: After a terrible start in other accommodation, which we managed to flee after great difficulty, we were so grateful to find this refuge in Istanbul. Professionally managed and well run, our every wish was accommodated by courteous and polite staff. 'Yes' was the answer to every question. The apartment was bright and spacious, spotless and lovely to come home to in the evenings after sightseeing. I would highly recommend the Galateia residence to anyone seeking a Sultanahmet alternative. Terrific location just off the Istiklal Caddesi....short walk to Tunel (this is important). Some flats offer Bosphorus views! Tip: bought the freshest fish under the Galata Bridge and prepared it in the apt. Great fun!

Reviews.Title: “The perfect place for business and pleausure”
Reviews.Author: GVILLA
Reviews.Content: Galateia is well positioned and fully furnished with all the amenities you would need. A big plus is the staff and the manager that are always ready to help. Defensively a perfect place for business travelers, families or anyone wants to visit Istanbul and have the comforts of home with high standards.

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable hotel in an excellent location”
Reviews.Author: ap200
Reviews.Content: We had an excellent stay at this hotel. Summary: LOCATION: Very convenient. Half block from Istikal where there are lots of shops and restaurants. Situated on a very quiet street. 5 min walk to Galata Tower. 2 min walk to the funicular. Overall excellent location. ROOMS: Very modern and comfortable. Our room had a large living room, dining area, kitchen (fully equipped), two bathrooms and one bedroom. There was also free WIFI in the room. The room was clean and of an excellent standard. The only small negative is that there were no small soaps/shampoos etc. Just a large wall dispenser by the sink and in the shower. STAFF: Everyone was very friendly and helpful. The front-desk personnel gave us excellent tips re: restaurants and made bookings for us. Being a smaller hotel, you could tell that they genuinely wanted to make our stay as comfortable as possible. OTHER NOTES: Taxi drivers seem to have a hard time finding the hotel despite its very central location. Make sure you have a good map with you to show the driver in case he gets lost. Alternatively, you can also get down at the funicular station (at the top) and walk approx. 200 meters to the hotel if you don't have much luggage. OVERALL: Excellent hotel and great stay. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip to Istanbul.

Reviews.Title: “Much needed bit of luxury and space...”
Reviews.Author: Elke1964
Reviews.Content: We arrived at the hotel having lost our luggage and we were thrilled to find our apartment was so clean, spacious, light and luxurious. The staff were very helpful with great tips on where to eat, shop and sightsee. They were also helpful with our search for our luggage. I enjoy windows and views so we were very pleased with so many windows and balconies in each room of the apartment! The heating was ideal, shower and bathroom huge and immaculate, kitchen modern with appropriate equipment. All in a gorgeous old building.

Reviews.Title: “An elegant home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: strabism
Reviews.Content: Staying at the Galateia Residences was a complete pleasure. The suite was very spacious and chic and we felt that we could say for weeks without being bored of it. We advise you to choose a room with a view of the Bosphorus as it was mesmerizing. For families this is a much better option than a hotel. The location was brilliant, close to everything but yet quiet and exclusive. We highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “This is a Wonderful Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: biemerToronto_Canada
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at the Galateia Residence. The staff was incredible - they arranged a last minute pickup from the airport (thanks, Yuksel!) and for a delicious breakfast every morning, as well as for very cheap laundry service which was welcome in the middle of a very hectic family vacation to multiple countries. The apartment was larger than some deluxe apartments I've seen! The interior design was very modern, from kitchen to bathroom. The location was in the heart of BeyoÄŸlu district close to Taksim Square, with its bustling cafe nightlife and fine shopping - a great place to start getting oriented to Istanbul. We couldn't have asked for a better stay.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: travelingbanana
Reviews.Content: We spent four days at the Galateia Residence and although we only booked a junior suite we were upgraded to the top floor apartment! The views of the Bosphorus were amazing and it was nice to have a terrace. The location is great, its right off of Istiklal Caddesi but you don't get any of the noise however it is hard for cabs to find. Plus: - comfortable bed - great soaps (Molton Brown) - staff is super friendly and helpful, provided an umbrella and allowed a late check-out - easy to get to Sultanahmet via tram - good restaurants/bars are super close - good internet service - apartment features but service of a hotel To address a previous poster's comments, we had no issue with room service waking us up and we slept in late a couple of the days. The shades/curtains in the room made it completely dark, thus leading to us sleeping in late those days!

Reviews.Title: “If you are looking for a spacious place in the middle of Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: chrisvschaefer
Reviews.Content: Then Galateia Residence is the right place for you. All apartment categories are spacious, clean and have all technical features you will ned for your stay. If you want a view and real luxury you should go for the superior appartments. The others might not have a view. Concerning the breakfast you do not have to order the lowest category because it is not worth it. You can easily find a place near the appartment in TÃ¼nel or the Istiklal to enjoy a delicious breakfast (for example in one of the House CafÃ©'s). The hotel manager YÃ¼ksel is doing a very good job: do not hesitate to ask him for recommendations. And: do not miss the Bosphorus tour on Sunday organized by him. :-)

Reviews.Title: “Enchanted istanbul”
Reviews.Author: isoGR
Reviews.Content: I've really impressed, easy, affordable, deluxe service, good sleep, good night.

HotelInfo.Name: Galateia Residence
HotelInfo.Address: Sahkulu Bostan Sk, No: 9 - 11 | Beyoglu, Istanbul 34420, Turkey
